thread.title: 17 Times "Boy Meets World" Left You Sobbing On The Floor
thread.title_full: 17 Times "Boy Meets World" Left You Sobbing On The Floor

author: Casey Rackham
title: 17 Times "Boy Meets World" Left You Sobbing On The Floor
text:
ID: 10316800 ABC
ABC
 ID: 10316804 2. When Shawn breaks down in front of his dad. View this image ›
ABC ID: 10316632 3. And then when the doctor tells the boys that Chet has passed away. View this image ›
ABC ID: 10316635 4. When Eric is heartbroken when he gets rejected from yet another college. View this image ›
ABC ID: 10316779 5. When Topanga leaves for Pittsburgh, but she finds her way back home. View this image ›
ABC ID: 10316810 6. When Alan won’t wish his son a happy birthday. View this image ›
ABC ID: 10316833 7. When Shawn is lost and finds himself in a cult, and his true family is there for him. View this image ›
ABC Cory: Shawn, this is a hug, OK? This is a hug. And this is when you hug somebody, when you care about them and you want them to know.
ID: 10316588 8. When Shawn says he never had any parents, and Alan and Amy tell him they can be that for him. View this image ›
ABC ID: 10316575 9. When Amy and Alan don’t know if their son is going to make it. ABC
ABC
 ID: 10316600 10. When Topanga is broken by her parents’ divorce. View this image ›
ABC ID: 10316835 11. When Cory chooses to clean out the family’s garage with Shawn and Topanga instead of his own brother. ABC
ABC
 ID: 10316758 ABC
ABC
 ID: 10316763 12. When Topanga feels uncomfortable and tells her professor to leave and he says, “That’s not what you want.” View this image ›
ABC ID: 10316710 13. When Cory cheats on Topanga. View this image ›
ABC Topanga: You lied to me?
Cory: I’m sorry. I’d rather break my ankle into fifty thousand pieces than cause you pain.
ID: 10316735 14. When Angela struggles with her feelings for Shawn because she doesn’t want to end up like her parents. View this image ›
ABC ID: 10316805 15. When Mr. Turner is in a motorcycle accident, and Shawn is afraid he’s going to lose him. View this image ›
ABC ID: 10316807 16. When Eric reminds the group of the importance of true friends. View this image ›
ABC ID: 10316828 17. And finally, when Mr. Feeny says goodbye. View this image ›
ABC ID: 10316582
